snippet: The report is unlikely to resolve more than a decade of fierce wrangling about the textbooks — part of a broader debate about Palestinian incitement against Israelis.
abstract: Academic study of contents of Israeli and Palestinian Authority textbooks finds that each side generally presents other as enemy, but findings undermine assertions by Israeli government that Palestinian children are educated to hate.
lead_paragraph: The report is unlikely to resolve more than a decade of fierce wrangling about the textbooks — part of a broader debate about Palestinian incitement against Israelis.

headline.seo: Study Belies Israeli Claim of ‘Hate’ in Palestinian Texts
headline.main: Academic Study Weakens Israeli Claim That Palestinian School Texts Teach Hate
headline.print_headline: Academic Study Weakens Israeli Claim That Palestinian School Texts Teach Hate
